content: knit 11 13 15 with new dp knit 11 13 15 k2tog k1 and with new dp k1 ssk knit 11 13 15 continue to shape toe decreasing every other row until there are 7 8 9 stitches on each dp then decrease every row until a total of 16 stitches remain graft toe general tips 1 if you run out of one of the yarns simply substitute a half ball of a new yarn and mark its mate for the second sock generally i try to pick a new yarn that has a similar colorway to the yarn it is replacing 2 when you put your work down and you wonder where you are if there is a dp with two yarns hanging start with the lower yarn if one thread is hanging from each dp then make sure you start with the yarn hanging from the starting point 3 be creative with your choices of yarns don t be afraid to mix self-stripings jacquards hand painteds etc in the same sock have fun
